articles.description: Hearts are in the Czech Republic to face Viktoria Plzen in the Europa League play-offs while Kilmarnock visit Copenhagen in the Conference League play-off round.
articles.title: Hearts & Kilmarnock play European play-off first legs

articles.description: England nudge ahead of a spirited Sri Lanka on a truncated second day of the first Test at Emirates Old Trafford.
articles.title: England vs Sri Lanka: Harry Brook and Jamie Smith put hosts ahead

articles.description: England full-back Kieran Trippier wants to leave Newcastle United before the transfer window closes.
articles.title: Kieran Trippier: Newcastle United defender keen to leave club this month

articles.description: Lando Norris says he has "not performed at the level of a world champion" this season - but still believes he can challenge for the title.
articles.title: Dutch Grand Prix 2024: Lando Norris still believes he can challenge Max Verstappen for Formula 1 title

articles.description: Emma Raducanu will face fellow Grand Slam winner Sofia Kenin in the Briton's first US Open appearance for two years.
articles.title: US Open draw: Emma Raducanu faces Sofia Kenin, Katie Boulter to play qualifier, Jack Draper v Zhang Zhizhen

articles.description: From an inspiring phone call with Louis Rees-Zammit to a chance meeting in a furniture shop - stories behind the UK's NFL hopefuls.
articles.title: Louis Rees-Zammit: Kansas City Chiefs player's inspiring phone call and a chance furniture shop meeting - the UK's NFL hopefuls

articles.description: England and Manchester City defender Kyle Walker says the tough love of his father made him an elite player.
articles.title: Kyle Walker: England and Manchester City defender says tough love of father made him elite football player

articles.description: Vinay Menon knew nothing about football when he went for a meeting at a West London mansion in 2009. A few weeks later he was in the heart of the Chelsea dressing room.
articles.title: Chelsea: Vinay Menon - Premier League's first wellness coach

articles.description: Listen to live BBC radio commentaries and follow live text coverage of day one of the County Championship.
articles.title: County Championship LIVE: Score & radio commentary from seven games

articles.description: Former Chelsea midfielder Conor Gallagher attempts some Spanish at his unveiling at Atletico Madrid with Julian Alvarez.
